about_the_game:
A game based on the bestselling book series by Kayla Stone. A gripping post-apocalyptic thriller. Experience the story from the books in a new installment.

During one of Michigan's cold winters, an EMP attack occurs, causing a power outage. Cars, phones, and other amenities are out of service.

Thanks to the EMP, Hannah Sheridan imprisoned for the past five years in a psychopath's basement can finally get out. At the edge of her mental and physical endurance and pregnant, Hannah tries to make her way through miles of freezing forest. She is determined to reach her family.

Survive


Look after food and fresh water and be prepared with limited equipment. Get plenty of sleep and watch the temperature. Cold and dark nights are not pleasant. Watch over your heroine's mental health. Avoid or confront danger with stealth and turn-based combat

Combat


Avoid danger by sneaking behind enemy's backs or face them in turn-based battles. Use the terrain to your advantage and utilise each character's abilities.

Build relationships


Talk to your companions and sing melancholic songs around the campfire. Hug and care for your dog to increase their affection.

Key features:

  • Mechanics of changing temperature and weather. The player must take care to conserve heat appropriately.
  • Crafting items from limited resources. It is not possible to make everything.
  • Extensive relationship system between companions.
  • Unique development trees for each character.
  • Struggling with the main character's overblown psyche.
  • Dangerous frozen lakes, frosty cliffs and caves.
  • A gripping and poignant story.
  • A realistic post-apocalypse without any zombies or mutants.
  • Each character has unique abilities allowing them to obtain items in different ways and enter places inaccessible to others.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence directed towards adults and animals. Violence is never directed towards defenceless characters. Game themes are serious with mature content. No sexual acts are shown.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: [2GHz+] Intel Core2 Duo E6550 / AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 4050+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 480 / AMD RX Vega 8 5000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: [3GHz+] Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: In the dead of winter, an EMP attack destroys the US power grid. For Hannah, however, it’s the best day in 5 years. She was imprisoned in a psycho's basement - explosion releases the lock of her prison. Now she can begin the search for her family while feeling the breath of her abuser on her neck.
